name: BILLY CLUB BADGE (includes shipping in US only)
description:
This remake of the classic 1977 CRIME BILLY CLUB BADGE shirt (as seen worn by Frankie Fix in the 1977 photo of CRIME.) Unisex, baby soft 100% cotton black shirt, reverse "seditionaries" style stitching w/ distressed collar. Limited first run. SHIPPING INCLUDED in US ONLY! Each shirt comes with a classic CRIME button and ships USPS Standard Mail. CHARGES APPLY FOR OVERSEAS SHIPPING!

Cleaning instructions: Turn shirt inside out and Machine Wash cold with like colors. Hang dry. (Do Not put in dryer).

(photo of band by James Stark)

name: SMOKING GUN (includes shipping in US only)
description:
WE HAVE BOOTLEGGED THE BOOTLEGGERS! The limited edition series of CLASSIC CRIME shirts is now available for the first time directly from CRIME MUSIC. The model, standing in front of the old Mabuhay Gardens in San Francisco, is 5'8" and wearing a size small. This unisex 100% white cotton tee, with black ringer collar and sleeves, has the image of the smoking gun and the CRIME logo, which was taken from the cover to a lyric book that was handed out at a CRIME concert at the Fab Mab on Saturday, December 17, 1977. SHIPPING INCLUDED in US ONLY! Each shirt comes with a classic CRIME button and ships USPS Standard Mail. CHARGES APPLY FOR OVERSEAS SHIPPING!

Cleaning instructions: Turn shirt inside out and Machine Wash cold with like colors. Hang dry. (Do Not put in dryer).

name: Badge 2 pack
description: One black Classic CRIME button, and one (no exit zine logo) CRIME button. FREE SHIPPING!

name: THE AUTHENTIC. THE ORIGINAL.
description: This rare CRIME poster has all the classic elements that are part of the band's aesthetic. Noir. Guns. and the infamous CRIME MUSIC logo at the bottom left hand corner. Also note the great Mabuhay Gardens graphic, with the classic bamboo lettering. Just the facts. THE AUTHENTIC. THE ORIGINAL. CRIME. Original poster is in near mint condition with minor crease on top corner. Only one available. Inquire about getting the poster signed, or buy now as is.
